title: Patchwork Square, late 19th–early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, synthetic stuffing
Technique: patchwork of printed textiles, quilted
description: Patchwork picture of a log cabin using 19th and 20th century fabrics; one of them a Centennial print. The patchwork is loosely stitched to a pink cotton backing fabric and has synthetic fiber stuffing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Patchwork Square, late 19th–early 20th century.Medium: cotton, synthetic stuffing
Technique: patchwork of printed textiles, quilted. 1974-58-1.
